item.title: Higgs Boson pipelines
item.description: What I want is to build a reproducible pipeline for the ATLAS 2014 Higgs Boson challenge. There are already some codebases for training and prediction.

item.title: Ian's podcast about League MLOps
item.description: They are using some recsys for riot games (e.g collaborative filtering) They uses binary format for making fast compile time.

item.title: League Versioning and Pipelines
item.description: I have 14gigs of data from all regions. It’s public in here I’m trying to parse this big file into smaller region-partitioned parquet data.
